article_title: CVSD taking a closer look at its health benefits
article_text:

article_metadata.description: SLIVER SPRING TWP. — A benefits consultant is recommending the Cumberland Valley School District implement several changes to the benefits package it provides employees, including spousal surcharges for health insurance
article_metadata.author: Daniel Walmer, The Sentinel
